author: fielding
msg: Fixed core dump when DocumentRoot is a CGI. [reported by geddis@tesserae.com]
Reviewed by: Roy Fielding, Dean Gaudet

author: fielding
msg: Remove a pcalloc that's not used in call_exec().

author: fielding
msg: Fix condition where, if a bad directive occurs in .htaccess, and
sub_request() goes first to this directory, then log_reason() will
SIGSEGV because it doesn't have initialized r->per_dir_config.
Submitted by: Marc Slemko and Dean Gaudet

author: fielding
msg: Avoid fd leaks by using pfopen/pfclose instead of fopen/fclose.
All the other uses of fopen/fclose, mostly for reading config files,
Submitted by: Randy Terbush and Roy Fielding
Reviewed by: Dean Gaudet, Jim Jagielski, Marc Slemko, Chuck Murcko
